body:
rook-operator v0.7.0 show Error after starting！
but rook-operator v0.6.2 is OK ，There is no problem。

**Bug Report**
rook-operator v0.7.0 show Error after starting：
```
2018-02-28 07:47:54.494361 I | op-cluster: starting cluster in namespace rook
2018-02-28 07:48:00.510035 E | op-cluster: failed to create cluster in namespace rook. **failed to create override configmap rook. configmaps "rook-config-override" is forbidden: cannot set blockOwnerDeletion in this case because cannot find RESTMapping for APIVersion v1alpha1 Kind Cluster: allowed by openshift authorizer, no matches for /, Kind=Cluster**
2018-02-28 07:48:06.511003 E | op-cluster: failed to create cluster in namespace rook. **failed to create override configmap rook. configmaps "rook-config-override" is forbidden: cannot set blockOwnerDeletion in this case because cannot find RESTMapping for APIVersion v1alpha1 Kind Cluster: allowed by openshift authorizer, no matches for /, Kind=Cluster**
```
**Please refer to similar mistakes：
https://github.com/kubeless/kubeless/issues/390**

**Environment**:
* Rook version (0.7.0):
* Kubernetes version (1.7):
* Kubernetes cluster type (OpenShift3.7):
* Ceph status (OK](https://Rook.io/docs/Rook/master/toolbox.html)):

**rook-operator v0.6.2 is OK ，There is no problem。**

```
apiVersion: rook.io/v1alpha1
kind: Cluster
metadata:
  clusterName: ''
  name: rook
  namespace: rook
spec:
  backend: ceph
  dataDirHostPath: /var/lib/rook
  hostNetwork: true
  monCount: 3
  placement:
    all:
      nodeAffinity:
        requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
                - key: storagenode
                  operator: In
                  values:
                    - rook
      tolerations: null
  storage:
    nodes:
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-14-131
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-27-78
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-3-148
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-41-50
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-5-180
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
      - devices:
          - name: vdc
        name: 10-10-8-82
        resources: {}
        storeConfig: {}
    storeConfig:
      databaseSizeMB: 1024
      journalSizeMB: 1024
      storeType: bluestore
    useAllDevices: false
```

# the ConfigMap rook-config-override
```
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config: |
    [global]
    osd crush update on start = false
    osd pool default size = 2
    [mgr]
    mgr_modules = dashboard
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: rook-config-override
  namespace: rook
```
